entry.title: ‚ÄúThere must be political harmony between Armenia‚Äôs president and the government‚Äù, Pashinyan

media:group.media:title: ‚ÄúThere must be political harmony between Armenia‚Äôs president and the government‚Äù, Pashinyan
media:group.media:description:
üìçIn a press conference on Monday, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan discussed President Armen Sarkissian‚Äôs decision to resign from his post. üìçArmenia will accept Turkey‚Äôs invitation to participate in the Antalya Diplomacy Forum from March 11 to 13. üìçAnkara says it plans to operate flights to Turkey‚Äôs different regions from Armenia.

entry.title: Understanding the Impact of Armenia‚Äôs President‚Äôs Resignation

media:group.media:title: Understanding the Impact of Armenia‚Äôs President‚Äôs Resignation
media:group.media:description:
In this edition of Insights With Eric Hacopian, Eric unpacks Armenian President Armen Sarkissian‚Äôs resignation, and the impact it will likely have on the country in the long run.

entry.title: Chess in Armenia: Playing like a girl

media:group.media:title: Chess in Armenia: Playing like a girl
media:group.media:description:
Armenia has one of the highest numbers of chess grandmasters per capita in the world. But, as in the rest of the world, female chess players are rare in the country. We spoke with players to understand why this is and how some are able to push the boundaries.

entry.title: Armenian President Armen Sarkissian to resign from his post

media:group.media:title: Armenian President Armen Sarkissian to resign from his post
media:group.media:description:
üìçPresident Armen Sarkissian says he is resigning because the position doesn‚Äôt give him enough power to influence events in the country. üìçPrime Minister Nikol Pashinyan will hold an online press conference at 8 pm. üìçArmenia elects a new human rights defender. üìçPashinyan had a phone conversation with Russian President Vladimir Putin. üìçFind out which company was the largest taxpayer in Armenia in 2021?
